Example Mock Test 1.author: Kaiser Chan
Example Mock Test 1.title: Example Mock Test 1
Example Mock Test 1.description: This mock test is made to familiarize yourself with the SPARC mock test system.
Example Mock Test 1.instructions: Answers to all math questions are nonnegative integers.

questions.statement: The value of $1+2+3+\frac45$ can be expressed as $\frac ab$ where $a$ and $b$ are relatively prime positive integers. Find $a+b$. (In other words, find the sum of the numerator and denominator of the value of the expression when expressed in simplest form.)
questions.explanation: The simplest form of the value of the expression is $\frac{35}4$. So, the answer is $35+4=\boxed{39}$.
